original_text: Some time later, Eve gave birth to Cain's brother. She called him Abel. When they had grown to become men, Abel took care of sheep. Cain worked on the land as a farmer.
korean_text: 그가 또 가인의 아우 아벨을 낳았는데 아벨은 양 치는 자였고 가인은 농사하는 자였더라

sentences.original_text: Eve gave birth to Cain's brother.
When they had grown to become men,
sentences.korean_translation: 그들이 다 자라 어른이 되었을 때,

sentences.original_text: Cain worked on the land as a farmer.
